page.title: 05BUTTERWICK VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Butterwick Village Hall has had many extensions, these include new toilets this year.The hall has also got a wooden stage.In the hall these things take place;{keep-fit,happy {circle,disco,bingo,Wednesday {group,jumble sales,garden {clubs,badminton and mothers union. The old school at Butterwick is used by{play school,youth club and {scouts,cubs,brownies and guides,mother {and toddler group and table tennis. In Butterwick village hall there is an auction once a month which is done by {Eleys.}There are Bible classes which are held in a private house,Sunday School is held in the church.There are Saturday and Sunday football teams which play the local Boston Leagues. The pub has darts teams.There is a newly founded Gardening club which meets once a month.
